```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
```

```{r import data, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggsci)
library(here)
here::i_am(path = "./Code/R results/food_web.Rmd")
# here()

jba<-read_excel(path = here("Data","Original_Brown_etal","JBA","JBA_Biota_fishmass_kk.xlsx"),
           sheet = "trophic")

wg<-read_excel(path = here("Data","Original_Brown_etal","WG","WG_fishMass_kk.xlsx"),
           sheet = "trophic")

```

```{r plot data}
ggplot(data = jba, aes(x = c13, y = n15, color = Sp, fill = Sp, label = Sp))+
  geom_point(size = 4, pch = 21)+
  geom_text(size = 3, nudge_x = 0.3)+
  theme_bw()+
  scale_color_cosmic()+
  scale_fill_cosmic()+
  ggtitle("JBA food web")

ggplot(data = wg, aes(x = c13, y = n15, color = Sp, fill = Sp, label = Sp))+
  geom_point(size = 4, pch = 21)+
  geom_text(size = 3, nudge_x = 0.3)+
  theme_bw()+
  scale_color_jama()+
  scale_fill_jama()+
  ggtitle("WG food web")
```
